mean_cn: n.（图片、布景等的）背景；（事件的）背景；出身，经历；时代背景
mean_en: the part of a picture, photograph or view behind the main objects, people, etc.; a colour or design on which something is painted, drawn, etc.
sentence: I have a photo with the sea in the background.
sentence_trans: 我有张照片的背景是大海。
word_etyma: back背后 + ground场地 → background背景，后台
